165921.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「おかえりなさい:
Welcome back! . Hmph! I can tell by your expression. You were able to fly to Lendor without any
problems! Then I will remove the limiter. Excuse me. Yes! The limiter has been deactivated!

165922.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「色々 お手数を:
Thank you for all the trouble you've gone through, and congratulations again! We hope you will make use of it
in your future adventures!

165924.「あらためまして カンタンに\n ルーラブースターの機能について\n 説明いたし:
Let me briefly explain the function of the Zoom booster. The Zoom booster is a device that allows you to Zoom
through the ceiling and other overhead obstacles. This will make your adventures more comfortable, as you
won't have to leave the building, cave, etc. once on foot or by Evac's spells. Well, it's a crying shame for
Evac spells, but technology is sometimes cruel, isn't it? The usage of Zoomstone itself is the same as
before, just select ''Zoomstone'' from the Items command. In rare cases, there are places where Zoomstone and
Evac are not effective due to some mysterious power, but please understand that the accompanying Zoom
Booster is not particularly effective in such places. That is all for now. We hope you will find Zoomstone and
Zoom Booster useful in your adventures in .

165925.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「世界宿屋協会で:
The World Association of Innkeepers will continue to provide strong support for adventurers! Please
continue to patronize us!

165926.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「世界宿屋協会で:
The World Association of Innkeepers will continue to provide strong support for adventurers! Please
continue to patronize us...and visit my office anytime. Shall I show you around?

165927.「承知いたしました。\n 私のオフィスに お越しになりたい時は\n いつでも 声:
Yes, sir. If you would like to come by
my office, please give me a call
anytime!

165928.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「フフ……歓迎し: <attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>You are welcome. Now, this way please.

165930.リンクスのオフィスへ 行きますか？<yesno><close>: Would you like to go to Lynx's Office?<yesno><close>

165784.「ふんぬぬ！ ……はぁはぁ\n やはり どうやっても 開かないな。\n どこかに:
OOMPH!... *Huff-Huff* As I thought, it won't open no matter how I try.
There's has to be a talented enough locksmith somewhere that can open this, isn't there.

165785.「ふんぬぬ！ ……はぁはぁ\n やはり どうやっても 開かないな。\n どこかに:
OOMPH!... *Huff-Huff* As I thought, it won't open no matter how I try.
There's has to be a talented enough locksmith somewhere that can open this, isn't there.

165786.<icon_exc><turn_pc>「いやはや お恥ずかしいところを\n お見:
Oh dear, how embarrassing to for you to see. I'm Reybassa, a traveling merchant.
...Oh, you seem to be a well-traveled adventurer, and you are... Ho, , is it.

165787.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「おお！ 無謀は:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1>Ooh! I know it's reckless of me to ask,
but the fact that one who approached me
happened to know of one is a lifesaver.<end_attr><bw_break>

165788.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「おお！ ありが:
Ooh! Thank you so much!
Let's get down to business: this Iron Safe's key to get to the legendary armor, is the wrong one and is of no use.
The Iron Safe uses a special key, and an ordinary locksmith isn't capable of making it. So, a top-notch locksmith's skill is needed.
During my travels, I heard a rumor of a top-notch locksmith being somewhere in Al-Ahagiro Kingdom.
So please go and ask them about the job.
I would go with you, but I'm in the middle of some business and need to stay in town for a while.
I'm sorry, but thank you so much.

165789.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「そうですか……。残:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1>Is that so... That's disappointing.<end_attr>
I'll be in town for business for a while,
so if you change your mind, please, let's talk.

165790.「おや？ どうやら <pc>さんは\n ほかの依頼で 手いっぱいのようですな。\:
Oh? It seems that you have your hands full with other requests.
As with any business, the busier the better, but any more requests may result in deadstock.
Please come back when you are done with the other requests.

165791.<icon_exc><turn_pc>「おお <pc>さん。\n 伝説の防具を:
<icon_exc><turn_pc>Ooh, <pc>. Will you assist me in
obtaining the legendary armor?

165792.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「そうですか……。い:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1>Is that so... I apologize for my abruptness.
As a merchant, I had confidence in my
discernment, but it seems I was wrong.<end_attr>

165991.「出会っていきなり お聞きするのも なんですが\n 大とうぞくのカギを作れるほど:
I know we just met, but you wouldn't know
of any top-notch locksmiths skilled enough
to make a Great Thief's Key, would you?<yesno><break>

165995.「じつは 私 一流の商人を目指しながら\n 伝説の防具を 探し求めていたのですが:
To tell you the truth, I'm aiming to be top- notch merchant by searching for legendary armor, and finally got such an item in this town!
...But, it's locked inside this Iron Safe that even a Megante can't break open, so I'm at a loss.
But the fact that we met here. You wouldn't mind assisting me in obtaining the legendary armor, would you?

167213.「ふんぬぬ！ ……はぁはぁ\n やはり どうやっても 開かないな。\n どこかに:
OOMPH!... *Huff-Huff* As I thought, it won't open no matter how I try.
There's has to be a talented enough locksmith somewhere that can open this, isn't there.

165793.「おお <pc>さん\n 伝説の防具が入った 鉄の金庫を開けるカギは\n できた:
Oh <pc>, did you get the key
to open the Iron Safe containing
the legendary armor?<open_irai><bw_break>

166336.「ウワサによると アラハギーロ王国のどこかに\n 一流のカギ師が いるらしいので:
Rumor has it that somewhere in Al-Ahagiro Kingdom is a top-notch locksmith, so could you ask them to make the key, please.
However, a top-notch locksmith-much like legendary armor-is rare. So one probably would not find them in a conspicuous place.

165794.「おお <pc>さん\n 伝説の防具が入った 鉄の金庫を開けるカギは\n できた:
Oh <pc>, did you get the key
to open the Iron Safe containing
the legendary armor?<open_irai><bw_break>

166337.「なんと カギを作るには 特別な素材が必要で\n 今は それを 取りにいくところ:
What's that, you need special materials to make a key, and you're on your way to get them now?
Oh my, it seems that it is not a simple task.

165795.「おお <pc>さん \n 伝説の防具が入った 鉄の金庫を開けるカギは\n でき:
Oh <pc>, did you get the key
to open the Iron Safe containing
the legendary armor?<open_irai><bw_break>

166338.「なんと カギの素材を 入手したのですか！\n では アラハギーロ王国にいる カ:
What's that, you obtained the key's material!
Then go to Al-Ahagiro Kingdom and ask the keymaster to make an Iron Safe Key please!

165796.「おお <pc>さん\n もしかして 鉄の金庫を開けるカギが\n できたのでしょ:
Oh <pc>, could it be that you
have the key to open Iron Safe?

165797.「おお！ これが鉄の金庫のカギですか。\n これで ついに 伝説の防具が私の手に:
Ooh! Is this the Iron Safe Key? With this,
I'll finally have the legendary armor in my
hands! So, let's do it...

165798.「おお…… 年月を積み重ねて にじみ出る\n 独特の風格と なお美しい たてじま:
Ooh... The unique style that oozes out over the years and the more beautiful vertical pattern.
Soft to the touch and light as a feather. No doubt, this is that marvelous merchant's legendary armor... The Long Johns!!

165799.<icon_exc>「……失礼いたしました。\n 念願の伝説の防具を 手に入れた:
...My apologizes. I was just so excited to have received the legendary armor of my dreams.
As a first-class merchant, one must wear legendary gear, and these Long Johns are perfect.
Truly, thank you so much. This is my way of saying thanks. Please accept it.

165800.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「これで 一流の:
As a first-class merchant, I've decided to own my own store.
I'll invite my wife and son from my hometown; together we'll make it a great store worth seeing.

165801.「私はもう 行商の旅には 出ないので\n 鉄の金庫は <pc>さんに差し上げます:
Since I'll no longer be a traveling merchant,
I'll give you the Iron Safe. If you like,
please use it on your adventures.

165802.「鉄の金庫を持っていると 旅の途中で\n 死んでしまい 教会に戻ることになっても:
As long as you have the Iron Safe, if you happen to die in your travels and revive at a church, you won't lose any of your gold.
Excessive travel should be avoided, but just like in business, there are times when you can't quit. At such times, please use it.

165803.「おや まだカギは 作られてないのですか。\n すみません 気がせいてしまって。:
Oh, you haven't made the key yet? Sorry, I
got carried away. Please let me know when
the key is ready.

166058.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「ついに……つい:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3>Finally... At long last, I have it!
With this, I'm one among the first-class
merchants!<end_attr>

165804.レイバッサに 鉄の金庫のカギを 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1><br: Give Reybassa the Iron Safe Key?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

165805.レイバッサは 鉄の金庫のカギを使った！<se_nots joutyu tag_n: Reybassa used Iron Safe Key!<se_nots joutyu tag_nots_map_r2020_8><bw_break>

166061.<pc>は レイバッサに\n鉄の金庫のカギを 渡した！: <pc> gave Reybassa the Iron Safe Key!

166914.レイバッサは 震える手つきで\n金庫の中にある 伝説の防具を 取りだした！:
Reybassa, with trembling hands, retrieved
the legendary armor from inside the safe!

165806.「<pc>さんの おかげで\n 一流の商人として 店を持つ決心ができました。\n:
Thanks to you, , as a first-class merchant, I've decided to own my own store.
Together, my family, will make it a great store, so please come visit us when we open.

81270.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「私どもの店は:
Our store is an armor shop in long-standing service of Gran Zedora's royal family.
Please enjoy your shopping with confidence.

81271.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「私どもの店は:
Our business comes from a long line of armor shops that catered to Gran Zedora's royal family.
Please, have peace of mind and enjoy your shopping.
...Ooh, what's that! You would be so kind as to offer yourself to help us with the Queen's request.
It is as the Queen says: the necessary ingredients to make the mantle are terribly difficult to come by, putting us at a loss.
The ingredient is called Golden Moonlight Thread, primarily used in embroidery, it is the most beautiful thread there is.
Outside the city, stretches the Gran Zedora Territory.
There, Golden Moonlight Thread may be obtained from <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s living nearby, south of the watchtower.
To complete the mantle you must obtain <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0> spools of Golden Moonlight Thread. Please return once you have obtained them.

81272.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「王妃さまから:
The Queen ordered a mantle, but if it is to be completed, Golden Moonlight Thread is necessary.
Outside the city, stretches the Gran Zedora Territory.
There, Golden Moonlight Thread may be obtained from <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s living nearby, south of the watchtower.
To complete the mantle you must obtain <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0> spools of Golden Moonlight Thread. Please return once you have obtained them.

81273.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「おかえりなさい:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1>Welcome! By chance, you wouldn't have
obtained Golden Moonlight Thread, would
you?<end_attr>

81274.「……おや。私の思いちがいでしたか。\n 月光の金糸が 手に入りましたら\n こ:
...Oh, I am mistaken. Please return once
you have obtained the Golden Moonlight
Thread.

81275.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「おおっ。これは:
Ooh. That is unmistakably the Golden Moonlight Thread! Thank you very much for collecting it.
Without delay, I will start putting on the finishing touches.
As soon as the royal family's mantle is completed, I will immediately deliver it to the castle, please report this back to the Queen.

81277.レンケンに\n月光の金糸を 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1><brea: Give Renken the Golden Moonlight Thread?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

81278.<pc>は レンケンに\n月光の金糸を 渡した！:
<pc> gave Renken the Golden
Moonlight Thread!

81280.「王家のマントは できあがり次第\n すぐに お城まで お届けいたしますので\n:
As soon as the royal family's mantle is
completed, I will immediately deliver it to the
castle, please report this back to the Queen.

81281.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「王家のマントは:
Please, rest assured that I have already delivered the royal cloak to the Queen.
Thank you so much for all that I have put you through..

81282.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「これは これは:
Truly, thank you very much for taking care of the royal family's mantle affair.
This store has a wide selection of high quality and high-end armor, certainly, you will find something useful as well.

92585.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「しばらく前まで:
Just a little bit ago, I happened to see soldiers from the castle inside the town.
They entered the armor shop and visited with the owner about something. Were they looking for something, I wonder?

92586.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「先日 アラハギ:
The other day a peddler from Al-Ahagiro Kingdom came and sold many trinkets, but...
Therein many items linked to Gran Zedora Kingdom's royal family were mixed in, I noticed.
I already reported and returned the trinkets to the castle... But what a thing to come about, don't you think?

92587.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「高価な品を た:
A soldier at the castle asked me if I had seen anyone trying to sell off a lot of expensive items. I told him
that I had seen someone like that at the Armor Shop. I wonder what it was all about?

96270.「フラスコさんという方を 探してるんですか？\n ……私は 昔から この町に\n:
Are you looking for someone named Mr.
Flasko? I don't know. I haven't lived
here long.

96271.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「なんだい？\n:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>What is it? Do you know Mr. Flasko? I
think Salma's grandfather who lives
next door had that name.

96272.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「イッショウって:
Did someone named Issho ask you to find someone for him? If you're looking for Flask, he was my
grandfather, but he's long gone. Lyriol and ? I've never heard of them. How many decades ago
are we talking about? But hmmm. I wonder if that's what you're talking about. About 60 years ago, when
Kafrizz Fever broke out in this town, there was an alchemist who made a drug that saved my mother's life. I think
he saved my mother's life. For more information, please visit my mother, Daira, who moved to Nalbia Town.
Nalbia Town was located on a small island in the center of Lendersia. It was a popular resort town at the time.

96273.「私の祖父 フラスコは もう亡くなりましたが\n ６０年ほど前 メラゾ熱のクスリ:
My grandfather, Flask, is dead now, but there was an alchemist who saved this town about 60 years ago by
creating Kafrizz Fever Medicine. I believe it saved my mother's life. If you want to know more, please visit my
mother, Daira, who moved to Nalbia Town. Nalbia Town was located on a small island in the center of
Lendersia. It was a popular resort town at the time.

96274.「ほう。ナルビアの町に住む 私の母から\n リリオルさんたちの話が 聞けましたか:
Oh, my mother who lives in Nalbia Town told me about Lyriol and her family. That's good to hear! Though the resort
project in Nalbia Town ended in failure. My mother had dreamed of living in Nalbia Town since she was a
child. She had been checking out properties in Nalbia Town, hoping to move there someday, and when she found
a good one, she moved in with great joy.

74096.「この広場は 剣の広場と呼ばれている\n 住民たちの いこいの場でしてね。\n<:
This plaza is called ''Sword Plaza,'' a place of love for the residents.
There is an anecdote that in the old days, the Hero personally trained young people in swordsmanship.
Which is the origin of the name ''Sword Plaza''.

74097.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「私は 武者修:
I have been traveling around the world as a samurai trainee, and this country combines the heroic spirit and refined
elegance of the Heroic nations. We Ogre could never create such a coherent town. Hmmm. I can feel the
difference in culture.

74098.「これより先は グランゼドーラ城。\n レンダーシア大陸の中心地にして\n 勇者:
The Gran Zedora Castle is the center
of the Lendersia continent and the
castle where the Hero resides.

74099.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「レンドア島に:
I heard that there is a handsome guy named Director Sugimu at Lendor Island. I wonder what kind of person
he is. I wonder if I should go to Lendor Island to see his face while I'm on my way to Lendor Island to buy
something.

74100.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「パパって こん:
I wonder if my dad had a face like this. I haven't seen you for a long time, so I forgot what you looked
like.

74101.「この城下町と お城を結ぶ 大きな橋は\n 勇者の橋と 呼ばれているんだ。\n<:
The big bridge connecting Castle Town and the castle is called Bridge of Heroes. I am sure that the Heroes of
the past returned to the castle via that bridge after defeating the Demon King.

74102.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「オレは 三度の:
I'm more adventurous than three meals a day. I've been to many towns and cities and I've found my own
definition of a good town. It's a woman. The more women who are enjoying life, the more vibrant the town. A
town where women are in the light is a great place to be.

74103.「夫は 傭兵の仕事で\n よその大陸に 行っていたんです。\n 本当は すぐに帰:
My husband was in another continent on mercenary business. He was supposed to come back soon. I was worried that he
was coming back so late, but I was relieved to hear that he was just stranded at a customs checkpoint. I'm
glad to hear that you are safe. But stranded at a customs gate? It's hard to believe that a royal family would
close the Three Way Gate.

74104.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「大魔王の軍勢が:
When the Great Demon King's army was so close, I thought this country was finished. Everyone was prepared to
die. We are enjoying the peace for the time being, but as long as the Great Demon King is here, his army will
attack us again.

74105.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「亡くなられたト:
The late Prince Toma often made inspections of the castle. I used to think that he was a true Hero who
listened to the voices of ordinary people like me and spoke to them with great care.

74106.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「まさか トーマ:
I am surprised that Princess Anlucia, not Prince Toma, will awaken as Hero. But won't the Great Demon King attack
again now that Hero-sama has awakened? I can't help but feel uneasy.

74107.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ボク 大きくな:
When I grow up, I'm going to be a soldier in Gran Zedora Castle. I'm going to be the one to protect
Princess Anlucia!

74108.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「お城にいる 賢:
Sage Lushenda in the castle has such a dynamite body! I want to be a sexy, cool and mature woman like her in the
future!

74109.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「なあ 旅の人。:
Hey, traveler, did you think the town and castle were pretty clean for being attacked by the Demon King's army?
That's right! The townspeople and soldiers all worked hard to restore it, even after sleeping. We'll fix it
again and again.

74110.「グランゼドーラ国王 アリオス王様の依頼を受け\n 当教会の主導によって 多くの:
At the request of King Arios of Gran Zedora, our church has sent a number of priests to various parts of
Astoltia. We hope that they will be of service to the adventurers.

74111.「以前 ココラタの浜辺から\n この国に 戻ろうとした時は\n 三門の関所が通れ:
When I tried to get back to the country from Cocolata Beach before, I had a hard time getting through the
Three Way Gate. I had no choice but to turn around and go back to Lendor Island, but after a while, a regular
boat to the kingdom started departing. I rushed to get on the boat. I'm so glad I got to see my family again.
From now on, I'll try to avoid traveling too far for work.

74112.「この劇場では 世界一の面白い人を決める\n 演芸グランプリが 開かれていたんだ:
This theater used to host the Goofball Grand Prix to determine the world's funniest person, but it's under
renovation. They won't be doing it for a while. When the Grand Prix is held, actors and minstrels come from all
over the world. The town gets really excited.

74113.「おお そなたが <pc>どのだな。\n ルシェンダさまより アンルシア姫さまと:
Oh, it is you . I have heard from Lushenda that you will be traveling with Princess Anlucia. I
have sent word for you to prepare a leg for your journey around Lendersia. I have spoken to Peddler Raban
outside. He is peddling his wagon around Lendersia. You can ride on his wagon. Your journey through Lendersia
will go much faster if you use the wagon. Go and have a look around this world!

88138.「おお <pc>どの。\n レンダーシアの旅に 外の馬車は役立ったか？\n<br:
Oh . Did the wagon out there help Lendersia on her journey? If so, then I, too, am glad I bowed
down to peddler Raban!

74114.「せっかく 船が来るようになったんだし\n よその大陸に 行ってみようかしら。\:
Now that we have boats, maybe we should go to another continent. Strange buildings, unusual cuisine,
unique clothing. It would be nice to go to a country with a different culture and get a taste of its
customs.

122517.「モンスター討伐隊からの要請を受けて\n 私が こちらに 派遣されることとなった:
Monster Strike Force has requested
that I be dispatched to your location.
I will fulfill my duties at once.<bw_break>

74115.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「トーマ王子の死:
The death of Prince Toma has brought sorrow to the town, but the return of Princess Anlucia has somehow restored
the brightness. Princess Anlucia is the hope of Gran Zedora, and this incident proves once again that she is
a precious existence.

74116.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「城内で おこな:
The banquet held in the castle to celebrate Princess Anlucia's return must have been a grand affair. I'm
sure they served delicious food that would melt your tongue. I wish I could have been there to accompany her.

74117.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「こちらは 港へ:
This is the building that leads to the harbor. If you are heading to Lendor Island, please take the elevator down
to the basement level.

78960.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「こないだ つい:
The other day, I finally went to Lendor Island to see the face of Director Sugimu, whom I have longed to
meet. He was indeed as handsome as they say he is, but I was less impressed by his face because of his
strong personality and the way he spoke.

78961.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「ひさしぶりに:
It's been a while since my dad came back, and I'm so happy that he's been playing with me every day, but I
really wonder if I've ever had a face like this.

78962.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「今まで 仕事で:
My husband, who used to be away a lot for work, is home to help me with the housework, which makes my life a lot
easier. Oh-hohoho.

78963.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「亡くなられたト:
The late Prince Toma used to make frequent inspections of the castle. Even now, I sometimes feel as if I can
hear his voice.

78964.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「あのね。ルシェ:
You know, Lushenda-sama has been sage at the castle long before I was born. Does that mean she already became a
sage when she was about the same age as me? Lushenda-sama, that's amazing~!

78965.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「私は もう何十:
I've lived here for decades, and it's a safe and comfortable place to live, thanks to Hero's patronage. Thanks to
the authority of the hero princess, this town will never again be attacked by the armies of the Great Demon King.

78966.「レンドア島行きの定期船は 再開されてから\n 順調に 運行しているようだな。\:
The liner to Lendor Island seems to be running smoothly since it was reopened. This means I won't be stuck
in the same situation as before. I'll be fine even if I have to take in some long-distance work.

78967.「おお！ そなたらは！\n 賢者ルシェンダさまより その活躍を\n 聞きおよんで:
Oh! I have heard of you! I have heard of your activities from Sage Lushenda. I hear that you are traveling around
the world in order to develop your power in the Pendulum of Fate. If the Pendulum of Fate is already full of
power, don't forget to show it to Sage Lushenda!

78968.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「せっかく 船が:
Now that the boats are coming, I was thinking of going to another continent. But when I finally decided
to go, I found myself thinking that I would miss being away from this town, and I stopped myself from going.

78969.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「いよいよ 大魔王と:
We're finally going to fight the Great Demon King? I hope you can defeat the Great Demon King soon and make us all
feel at ease!

78970.「これは 姫さまと <pc>どの。\n ふたたび いずこかへ 向かわれるようだな:
This is the princess and . It seems that you are once again heading for someplace else.
I am here to wish you good fortune. Please take care of Princess Anlucia.

86290.「おお 姫さまと <pc>どのか。\n ご無事で なにより。\n<br>\n「ル:
Oh, the princess and . I'm glad you are safe. Lady Lushenda is waiting for you. Would you please
make your way as quickly as possible to Lushenda's office on the second floor of the castle?

78971.「ここは 勇者の国として知られる\n グランゼドーラ王国の城下町だ。\n<br>:
This is Castle Town in the Gran Zedora Kingdom, known as the Land of Heroes. Centered on the plaza in the center,
the north side of the town is mainly residential area, and the south side is for travelers such as inns.

86311.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「白い天馬に さっそ:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>Princess Anlucia riding on a white
horse.How beautiful. I am so moved
that I can't stop crying.

86312.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「勇者がペガサス:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I never thought I would see Hero
riding off to battle on his Pegasus. I
guess one lives a long time.

86313.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「姫さまたちは:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>The princesses are riding on horses
and flying through the sky! I love it!
I want to ride a flying horse too!

86314.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「あの翼の生えた:
That winged horse is said to be the legendary Heavenly Horse that once fought together with Hero against the
evil ones. I never thought such a thing would appear. No, that's not surprising. Is it natural? Princess
Anlucia is the true Hero.

102377.「この広場は 剣の広場と呼ばれている\n 住民たちの いこいの場でしてね。\n<:
This plaza is called the ''Sword Plaza,'' a place of love for the residents. There is an anecdote that
in the past, Hero-sama personally trained the young people in swordsmanship, which is the origin of
the name ''Sword Plaza''. Now that the Great Demon King is gone, peace has been restored, and I hope that Hero
Princess Anlucia will train the young people in the same way. Yes, that's right! How about you, Hero ally,
joining us? Of course, I'll be the one to train them.

102378.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「なんでも こ:
It is rumored that a hero princess in this kingdom has defeated the Great Demon King Madesagora. I would love to
have a meeting with her, but since she is also the princess of a kingdom, I guess it's an unrealistic expectation.
What? You're the hero princess's group? Again, you're joking too much. A princess wouldn't be wandering
around Castle Town, would she?

102379.「あっ。あなたが もしかして\n 勇者姫さまの盟友の <pc>さん？<yesno:
Ah. Are you perhaps the hero
princess's <pc>?<yesno><break>

102380.「あら ごめんなさい。\n 人ちがい しちゃったみたいです。:
Oh, I'm sorry. I think I got the wrong
person.

102381.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「やっぱり！ 勇:
After all! You fought the Great Demon King together with the hero princess, didn't you? That's amazing! I admire
you so much!

102382.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「パパがまた お仕事:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>My dad has to go to work again. But
I'll try not to forget to wear a face
this time!

102383.「この城下町と お城を結ぶ 大きな橋は\n 勇者の橋と 呼ばれているんだ。\n<:
The big bridge connecting Castle Town and the castle is called the Bridge of Heroes. Like the Heroes of the past,
Princess Anlucia crossed that bridge after defeating the Great Demon King and made her triumphant return to the
castle! You're the princess's group, aren't you? Have you come to cross the bridge again? The hero princess and her
companions crossing the Bridge of Heroes. It's nice to see them again and again!

102384.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「もう 大魔王の軍勢:
So the armies of the Great Demon King will no longer ravage this kingdom. Oh. Thank you, Hero Princess Anlucia.
Hero Princess Anlucia.

102385.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「アンルシア姫様:
Princess Anlucia has fulfilled her role as a Hero with great success. I think it was thanks to Prince Toma in
heaven who was watching over her.

102386.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「大魔王を 見事:
The fact that she successfully defeated the Great Demon King means that Princess Anlucia was a true Hero
after all. To be honest, I was worried about it. I am deeply sorry.

102387.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ボク 大きくな:
When I grew up, I wanted to become a soldier of Gran Zedora Castle to protect Princess Anlucia. But Princess
Anlucia said that someone named ally was always by her side, protecting her. So I don't really have a role to
play, do I? Huh? Princess Anlucia? Then, could it be that person over here is Ally? She looks a bit
helpless. Okay, I've made up my mind! I'll become an ally together with you!

102388.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「ねえねえ。勇者:
Hey, hey, you're with the hero princess, that means you're Ally, right? You defeated the Great Demon
King, right? I don't know about the Great Demon King, but he's really strong, isn't he? Hero and ally are
really great, aren't they?

102389.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「私は もう何十:
I've lived here for decades, and it's a safe and comfortable town to live in, as it's right under the Hero's
nose. Oh, isn't this a group of people who are friends of the hero princess? You all defeated the Great Demon King,
so there's nothing to worry about anymore.

102390.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「グランゼドーラ:
At the request of King Arios of Gran Zedora, our church has dispatched many priests to various parts of Astoltia.
King Arios would be pleased if they could be of help to the hero princess and her allies in defeating the Great
Demon King.

102391.「ここが 大魔王の軍勢に\n 襲われる心配も なくなったし\n そろそろ 遠出の:
Now that I don't have to worry about the Great Demon King's army attacking this place, it's time to get back to
my work on the road. I have to feed my family. I'm a little worried about my kids forgetting my face.

102392.「ここは 大魔王マデサゴーラを倒した勇者\n アンルシア姫さまが おられる\n:
This is Castle Town in Gran Zedora Kingdom, where Hero Princess Anlucia, who defeated Great Demon King
Madesagora, resides. Centered on the central plaza, the northern part of the town is mainly residential areas,
while the southern part is home to inns and other facilities for travelers. So, it's the princess and
her party, is it? Making the rounds? Thank you very much. As you can see, Castle Town is a peaceful place.

102393.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「アンルシア姫が:
Princess Anlucia has defeated the Great Demon King and the town has regained its full brightness. I heard
that it was thanks to a person called ''ally'' who protected Princess Anlucia in place of the deceased Prince Toma.

102394.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ついに アンル:
At last, Princess Anlucia and you have defeated the Great Demon King. From now on, we can live in peace. I'm so
thankful.
